about.title: About
about.empoweringNeuroscientists: Empowering Arab neuroscientists to shape the future of brain science
about.aboutText: We are a community of Arab speakers interested in Neuroscience, cognitive science, and psychiatry. Aimed for aspiring Arab neuroscientists to connect, collaborate, and contribute. We aim to engage Arabic-speaking neuroscientists in hands-on experience to kick start their careers.

contact.embarkJourney: Embark on a journey through the intricacies of the mind with us.
contact.virtualDoorsOpen: Whether you have questions, seek guidance, or simply want to delve deeper into the fascinating world of neuroscience tutorials, our virtual doors are always open.
contact.exploreWonders: Connect with us and let the exploration of the brain's wonders begin.
contact.sharedCuriosity: Your inquiries are the sparks that fuel our shared curiosity.

faq.beyondAnswers: Beyond being answers, FAQs are solutions delicately woven in the fabric of simplicity.

school.introCompNeuroText: Introduce tools that are essential for starting work in computational neuroscience. It includes pre-requisite knowledge such as programming with Python, linear algebra, calculus, statistics, and basic neuroscience.
school.applications2022: In 2022, We received over 250 applications from 13 different Arabic speaking nationalities. Among those applications we accepted 27 applicants from 9 different countries. Among accepted, we selected 4 to become teaching assistants.
school.closedApplications2023: Applications for the 2023 summer school have closed.

description.title: More Than Just Knowledge
description.description: This Summer School is about igniting your passion, building a vibrant community of like-minded individuals, and empowering you to become a pioneer in the field of computational neuroscience.
description.connectDescription: No borders can limit your learning! Join fellow Arab students and professionals through Zoom, forming lasting friendships and fostering a supportive network across the region.
description.immerseDescription: Our dedicated Discord server is your 24/7 playground for brain enthusiasts. Ask questions, discuss challenges, and collaborate on projects, even after the sessions end.
description.rubDescription: Learn firsthand from leading researchers in computational neuroscience, gaining insights into groundbreaking research and real-world applications.
description.forefrontDescription: Access the latest discoveries and trends in the field, keeping you informed and ahead in a rapidly evolving domain.
description.equipDescription: Equip yourself with required skills and knowledge for a career in research, academia, or industryâ€”where your contributions can solve critical challenges in neuroscience and beyond.

details.calendarImportInfo: TO AVOID CONFUSION, you can import the above calendar to your own Google calendar. It currently shows the times according to Eastern time but if you import it, it will convert to your local time zone.
details.acceptanceNotice: We accept Arabic-speaking participants from all over the world
details.timeExplanation: 0:00 time here corresponds to the starting time of the day. The time is depending on your location is as follows:
timeZonesList: (UTC +3) Palestine, Lebanon, Syria, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, and Egypt: 6:00 PM
(UTC +4) UAE, Kuwait, Oman, Bahrain, Qatar: 7:00 PM

footer.shapingFutureNeuroscience: Shaping the future of Neuroscience in the Arab world!
